name: WizardScape

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wizard scape
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Muggles of Earth! Gracia is here you to take you to the realm of wizardtopia.Get your wands, chimes and spells ready. Take better decisions ensure your long survival. Hop around, do good feats, but beware of the bushes, well and the beast! Defeat the enemies, and earn perks! Rexorean stones can help you take care of your unwise decisions! 

Made with magic, love and by @awrpit. Would love to gather feedback, hit up on any social media. Suggestions and feedbacks are always welcome,
Until then,
Have fun into Wizardtopia with Gracia.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
